title: A practical approach to demonstrate the circular economy in remediation of textile dyes using nutraceutical industrial spent
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26464-26483
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03796K, Paper

Syed Noeman Taqui, Usman Taqui Syed, Rayees Afzal Mir, Akheel Ahmed Syed, Shareefraza J. Ukkund, Hemavathi Nagaraju Deepakumari, Abdullah I. Al-Mansour, Shamshad Alam, Parveen Berwal, Hasan Sh. Majdi
We used Nutraceutical Industrial Coriander Seed Spent (NICSS), as an innovative adsorbent for the bioremediation of a bisazo Acid Red 119 (AR 119) dye.
